item.title: Install OpenStack AIO via Kolla-ansible
item.description: Introduction This article is my note during installing OpenStack AIO by Kolla-ansible. Topology We will use two nodes. One is to install OpenStack, one is to install Kolla-ansible which will be used to install OpenStack to the OpenStack node. Installing Step 1: Prepare environment On Kolla-ansible node, we need to install Git, and some packages. yum install epel-release -y yum install python-pip -y yum install python-devel libffi-devel gcc openssl-devel libselinux-python -y yum install ansible -y On OpenStack node, we need to create a volume group with “”.
